title: FPS Drop when moving mouse in game
body: During game, if I move my mouse my game stutters as if my FPS is crashing , but I will often still have 50-100 FPS, and I will be at 40 ping. I tried to find stij.exe and it doesn't seem to be the issue, and I have only started having this issue about 2 weeks ago.

replies.body: You aren't seeing things teleport or stop and then catch up shortly afterward? Do you notice anything else happen in-game during the other symptoms you've noticed?

Hello, i'm having the same issue as the OP. When I move my mouse, the FPS drops to almost an unplayable level. When champions go into the fog of war, some visual effects will appear and then teleport to catch back up to the champ. Ive looked for the Stij.exe and it doesnt appear to be the issue. Any tips or tricks I can use to fix this would be greatly appreciated.

It was speachRuntime.exe I believe. I would just close that and be fine. Really weird that it had that interaction. Windows 10, just went into task manager. I eventually figured it out after research. Sorry I never got back, thank you for the post. You can tell others that speachRuntime is/was an issue.

I dont have speachruntime.exe or stij.exe
what do i do
yep same this is really odd

Hey, I hope you could fix the error by now.

I had a similar problem 2 days ago. I switched from Fullscreen to Borderless. This fixed it for me.

I used to have the same issue, which really hindered my ability to play champions like Draven or Katarina. However, I saw a post similar to this and it said to run the League of Legends client as an administrator. I tried this, and I don't have the issue anymore. It may not work for you because not everybody has the exact same solution to a problem but at least try this and see if it works.
